channel.title: Range on my server- Bows use melee/require no arrows!
channel.description:
ok title pretty much says it, i put some customs in my server but when i use them they dont use arrows and train melee stats and on the combat tab they say "slash, chop, block, lunge" instead of "rapid, accurate, longrange"
i know its probly an easy fix but ive searched on 4 websites and goodgle for the past 2 days and cannot find an answer. thanks to anybody who helps me, it means alot.
